document.full_text: anoop desai may not have won season 8 of "american idol," but the up-and-coming pop/r&b artist is set to prove himself a champion with his new "zero" series.
document.title: "idol" anoop desai unveils next phase with "zero.0"
lines_and_colors: anoop desai may not have won season 8 of "american idol," but the up-and-coming pop/r&b artist is set to prove himself a champion with his new "zero" series.
